Introduction

Shownu, born Sohn Hyun-woo, is the leader, main dancer, and lead vocalist of the boy grouo MONSTA X under Starship Entertainment.

As a trainee, he was part of the project group Nu Boyz, alongside MONSTA X member Jooheon and former member Wonho. In 2014, he debuted in MONSTA X after competing on Mnet’s No.Mercy.

Fun facts

1
Before debuting with Monsta X, Shownu was a back dancer on Lee Hyori's "Bad Girl" performances.
…
2
On the survival show "No Mercy", Shownu was the second member to be announced as part of Monsta X.
…
3
In swimming contests, he has achieved first place four times, second place four times, and third place once.
…
4
When he was a kid, he wanted to be a swimmer, an office worker, and a singer.
…
5
He filmed a commercial with Yebin from DIA and shared his earnings with his team.
…
6
He earned the nickname “The Second Rain” because he had a similar way of singing and dancing with Rain.
…
7
He went to Sejong Cyber ​​University Graduate School in the Department of Business Administration.
…
8
He covered 2PM's 'I Hate You' alongside fellow MONSTA X member Hyungwon
…
